alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern DeKalb, west central Gwinnett and northeastern Fulton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Brookhaven, or near Decatur, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, Duluth, Lilburn, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Berkeley Lake, Tucker, North Decatur, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Druid Hills and Piedmont Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
